EmailTemplate.name: Trade Community - Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Target_User.FirstName}, Welcome to the ITA Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome {!Target_User.FirstName},
We're glad you've joined our International Trade Administration Community!
Your Username is: {!Target_User.Username}
As a registered community member, you can:
Search our market intelligence repository for opportunities, events, and market research Save articles to your profile Create customized, private boards to organize your research
New market research and events are added weekly so check back often to stay abreast of the latest market intelligence available.
Thanks for joining!
- Trade Community Team
